attributes.additional_details: The prorogation of Parliament prior to the 31st October in an effort to force through a No Deal Brexit is a direct affront to the democracy system in the United Kingdom and as such an affront to the population of the United Kingdom. The government must be made to adhere to Parliaments will as direct representation of the citizens of the UK
attributes.background: Prevent the Prorogation of Parliament to force through a No Deal Brexit as an affront to the democracy of the United Kingdom
